headline: Assessing Masco (MAS) Valuation After Insider Share Purchase And Positive Analyst Sentiment
summary: Masco (MAS) caught investors attention after VP and Chief HR Officer Jennifer A. Stone acquired 26,140 company shares, a move that coincided with a 4.1% jump in the stock and reinforced already positive analyst sentiment. See our latest analysis for Masco. Stone’s purchase and the recent 4.5% 1 day share price return sit against a mixed picture, with a 10% 30 day share price return and a 5.5% decline in 1 year total shareholder return. The 3 year total shareholder return of 36.9% suggests...

headline: 3 Mid-Cap Stocks We Steer Clear Of
summary: Mid-cap stocks have the best odds of scaling into $100 billion corporations thanks to their tested business models and large addressable markets. But the many opportunities in front of them attract significant competition, spanning from industry behemoths with seemingly infinite resources to small, nimble players with chips on their shoulders.
